trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <xref:System.String> type to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 변환 된 <xref:System.String>에서 입력 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 인스턴스.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스의 인스턴스에 지정 된 형식에서 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>변환할 수에서 <xref:System.String>유형.</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 컨텍스트 정보를 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 형식 변환에 대해 평가 되는 원본입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>변환기의 인스턴스로 지정된 된 형식에서 변환 하는 경우 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 여부를 확인 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 다른 형식으로 변환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: 변환이 가능한 경우에만 `context` 는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>유형 및 `destinationType` 는 <xref:System.String>유형.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>속성에 대 한 `context` null 이거나 같은 수 없습니다 <xref:System.String.Empty>를 식별 하는 `context` 익명 <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>변환기의이 인스턴스를 변환할 수 있으면 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> 지정 된 형식; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
